meanings.sent1: She enjoys bekissing her dog every morning.
meanings.sent2: The young couple was bekissing under the moonlight.
meanings.sent3: The puppy was bekissing the sleepy cat, trying to wake it up.
meanings.sent4: The waves bekissing the shore in a gentle embrace.
meanings.sent5: The grandmother's wrinkled hands bekissing the cheeks of her grandchildren.

meanings.definition: The act of kissing repeatedly or affectionately.
meanings.sent1: Their bekissing was a sweet display of affection.
meanings.sent2: The sound of their bekissing echoed in the quiet room.
meanings.sent3: The bekissing between the actors on stage drew applause from the audience.
meanings.sent4: The bekissing of the waves against the boat lulled him to sleep.
meanings.sent5: The bekissing of the sun on her skin made her feel warm and loved.
